评论详情: Absolutely wonderful dress. Fit like a dream! True to size, very flattering on. Definitely needs an iron after washing, it is machine washable. Didn't shrink at all. There is no stretch at all in this material. Color is true to image.
The fit the color

评论概述: Great quality, perfect fit, has pockets!
评论详情: I ordered this for an upcoming Disney Cruise with family. I’m about 5’7” and 195 lbs. Bought XL. The dress fits beautifully. The tie belt is wide and crisp. Has just a bit of stretch, which is exactly enough. Great value for the money.
Got the dress for myself, but my mom ended up wearing it to a wedding. She loves the dress and now she wears to church super cute.
I love everything about this dress. I am 5”2 weight 150 the medium fit perfectly.

评论概述: Not made for cup sizes over 36D
评论详情: Wanted to fit into this dress sooooo badly but since I’m a larger chest than most, it would not zipper past the bra line without it potentially compromising the material and zipper.  And large would probably fit more like a bag than a glove.  If I was a typical size for chest, I’d probably be far more comfortable and thrilled!  Wishing you all the best but do not purchase M if you’re 5’3”, 36D and around 128lbs
I was surprised how good the fabric is! Nice dress. Very good quality.
True to size , for a little snug on top but was still able to wear and looked great  Had a large

This dress is very pretty.  The quality of the material is perfect for the A-line dress type.  the fit also was exactly what I expected.  The length is just right for me.  Hit just below the knee which is what I was going for.  Great for a more 1950's look/feel.  Would buy again.
Not the full look, the dress fit well but I could have gotten a medium. I am 5’7 and 160. I also got a black twill to make it nice and puffy!
I’m 5’0 and 140 lbs, and the Length and size perfect really fit exactly right.

评论概述: Nice dress, but you NEED to care for it.
评论详情: Great style and pattern, But the fabric is thin. If you're careful not to get stains on it you'll be solid. Dry clean it, what ever you do... Don't throw it in the washer.  I got it for my girlfriend, she loves it. Fast delivery, and seller has many different styles.

I looked damn good in this dress! I went with the suggestion of a Large but I probably could've gotten away with wearing a medium. It was a little too big around my neckline and waist. Other than that, I LOVE that this dress has POCKETS!!! all women know what a big deal that is lol. Material was whatever, I just needed a Christmassy dress. Not itchy and not super stretchy. Would buy again but I'd probably get my regular size.
Loved the material and fit.

评论概述: This dress seems to run true, meaning  it is bigger than the PUKAVT — No need to size up
评论详情: Just a quick note. If you’ve tried some of the other 50s style dresses, you may know they run small. Meaning you need to size up one size bigger than you normally wear. I normally take a medium but in those dresses I had to take a large. I assumed I should get a large in this particular dress, too, thinking they were the same. They are not. I am swimming in this large dress, Meaning this seems to run True to size. I’m going to order a medium and double check. But at this point, I think you may not need to size up. I’ll update this review. The avocado dress  is adorable.
I absolutely loved this dress.  The quality, the color and flare was everything I needed and more.  It was true to size.
Fits true to size. I wear it with a petticoat under for some added fullness but it’s perfect on it own. I bought a couple more in different prints.
It’s a nice dress, I loved the pockets.

This is very cheaply made with incredibly thin material. I guess if you wanted something light weight for a summer event this could be a contender. It wasn’t very flattering on me at all. I ordered according to the chart based on measurements I took that day, and it was still incredibly big. I’d need at least two sizes smaller. I wouldn’t try this for anything where you need to look put together. It will be painfully obvious you dug this out of the first few items on Amazon’s “price low to high” sort.

Was in search for a dress to wear to a themed party.  This dress is well made.  Hemmed nicely. Invisible zipper. It took a few orders to find one that fit.  Going by their size chart, I initially purchased an XL mainly for the waist size and the fact that the dress had a little bit of stretch.  Unfortunately the XL was more like an XXL.  I reordered the same dress in a Large - it was a really snug Large and had a pucker at the neckline.  So I again reordered the same dress in a Large and the second one received fit beautifully and was sewn well at the neckline. Definitely a keeper. I plan on ordering another print down the road.  For reference: I am 5'3" ; 165lb ; 36D ; waist 35.  I do plan to wear amazon.com/dp/B016OPWR64 under it to give the skirt more shape.
Very flattering and fit perfect based on the recommended size. Zipper works great and hasn’t gotten stuck at all. And the color is beautiful. Oh and it has pockets!!!
Prefect fit! Looks exactly like the photo!

I rarely write reviews but this dress is cut so well! I’m 5’6”, major pear shaped, with wide hips and saddle bags and so finding dresses and skirts are so hard for me, but this is actually really good! I got back to be safe and the 3xl as I wear size 24 in jeans. I plan on getting other colors from this place as well, excited to be wearing dresses again!
The dress is absolutely picture perfect and looks so pretty but to find to find it has pockets makes it truly perfect. Great dress for the holidays if you're more of a classy Christmas type.

I wore this dress on my honeymoon cruise. It has a little stretch, pockets, and was not super thin. I did Purchase a petticoat to wear underneath and puff up the skirt. Got so many compliments. I’m 5’4 and around 150 lbs. purchased a medium.
Fabric quality is superb. True to size amd looks great.

The line on the dress is ruined by the pockets; the way they are cut out and attached is poorly constructed, they can’t even be pinned down or sewn shut so as to fix the lines of the dress!  Other than that, the dress is great! If I can problem-solve the pocket issue, I’ll be buying more color-ways, because it’s flattering and fun…

评论概述: Surprised by how nice this was!
评论详情: I ordered this dress for an event in December and was absolutely surprised at what a nice dress this is. It fits well and doesn't have any weird places that it gaps or creases in a funny way. It is definitely worth this small price tag for such a fun dress.

评论概述: The rose the black and hose dress came back wonderful thank you
评论详情: For Anything back late thank you The dress came back great Thank you so much god bless

评论详情: Dress was pretty. But unfortunately the red color leaked on the white of the dress. They did quickly return my money. I was sad because it was such a pretty pattern.
This works great for any Disney meal. Minnie and Mickey love it. Fits well. I do put a crinoline under it. And it has pockets!
Wore this to an afternoon wedding and it was perfect. Exact sizing (12) for me. Comfortable and easy to care for.  I'm going back for another one in a different pattern.
reading other reviews that stated it ran small I bought a larger size , it is a little big but not enough to go down a size. The pattern is cute and the material is lightweight
Fits perfectly good quality light weight fabric very flattering on doesn't wrinkle much

Awesome quality especially for the price!!! I would recommend a simple petticoat under, it really sets it off! I am between an 8 and 10, I ordered a size large initially and it was a little big so I quickly ordered a medium and it was perfect. Return was no issue, great seller, highly recommend!
Good value for money, fits good,
Terrible material. Arrived smelling like women's perfume and feeling oily.
Great price, wonderful fit, true to size, classic style, does not wrinkle excessively when seated, the Sicilian Lemon print was a huge hit, so many compliments, nice, cool dress for summer.
This dress is worth the price … very good quality and true to size …..so lovely

I absolutely loved this dress. The pattern was very true to the pictures on the listing. The size was true. The material is not too thin and keeps you cool. I felt it hugged in all the right places and I got many compliments on it.

Loved the dress. Just what I expected. I had to adjust the size up  to fit.

The dress was exactly as advertised,  nice thick cotton with a lining around the top. It's exactly as pictured with fitted top and wide skirt with pockets. I'm going to order more because fitting someone like me with a 38D cup size is next to impossible in a fitted top
Fabric feels really good on skin comfortable dress
The 3x fit to tight
Loved dress great fit. Tea party

评论概述: Cute Dress but watch the size
评论详情: As others have said, this is a well-made dress. Pockets and lined top. I am using it for a 'Stepford Wife' costume but at the price you easily could have adorable bridesmaids. My tip? buy multiple sizes and maybe another pattern. I have the teal one in XL and it's easily a 16 and I have to take it up. I purchased the black/roses in a large and it's a snug 12 and maybe not as full in the skirt. I think they are made in different places. I am going to use them both, take in the xl for one event and suck in my gut for the other. I wish I had more time to order others in L and see if they are cut differently.
This dress looked just as I imagined, the southern bell throwback look I was hoping for. True to size however not stretchy. I purchased an XL… my weight is between 179-185.
Wore on Easter and received more than a dozen compliments. Pairs best with pink, hot pink, and even rose colors.
It’s a comfortable dress. I could’ve sized down. Very vibrant and pretty.

评论概述: Found one in a thrift store - will be ordering more!
评论详情: My mom found one of these dresses in a thrift store and we both are absolutely enamored with it. The craftsmanship is pretty solid while being affordable. It fits my mom like a glove - and she is 5 feet tall and usually wears an XL in tops. The shape of the dress is incredibly flattering and genuinely makes my mom feel so much more beautiful than she has in a long time. I’m going to order some for myself too! Thank you for making something that is both beautiful and affordable for folks like us.
Not what I wanted doesn’t look right on me at all

I am 5'4", 150lb, and a C36. (Yes I am a mom with a proud "mommy belly". The dress was not tight on my body. It was movable and easy to sit in. It does have a tie that matches the dress, but I think the dress would have looked better with a colored belt.
I got a lot of compliments on dress while out At Lucy festival

This was a very cute dress and I loved the material.  I took my measurements and I was a little below the measurements for the size XXL but it was still a little tight and short.  I wish I could have kept it.
Looks best on a smaller waist. Well made.
Bought this for my daughters graduation. It fit her perfectly. Very well-made. Repeat buyer for the style dress.

Just the look I was going for! The little bumble bees were a cute surprise so I paired with yellow kitten heels and couch to a wedding. I got tons of compliments. I ordered a 2x, however it was a pretty generous 2x and I probably could have gotten a 1x for a more fitted look but it was not loose or baggy.  I wore it with a petticoat for a vintage cocktail look, but this could easily be dressed down with a Jean jacket. Best part..it has POCKETS. I will be buys other patterns. I live it!

评论概述: Really Well Made and Fun Too!
评论详情: As someone who sews, I was expecting a cheaply made dress at this price.  Was I WRONG!  This is a quality made garment with a lining in the top.  The fabric is a nice cotton and is brightly colored.  I loved the way it fit and the way it moved.  I did use a petticoat under it for a "Garden Party" and it was so fun that way.  Truly well made and worth the price!
Slight stretch in the bust area. Great quality material. Not cheaply made.
It fits me perfectly!

Accommodates women with larger boobs. My 36 D’s did not fill this dress up. I would get a size down if I were to rebuy this dress still may not go fill it out. Dress was also long for my 5’ 5 height and hung mid shin. I wanted to love this dress but it wasn’t made for my physique.
Didn’t like material or Fit
very pretty, well made, it is lined on the bodice, but runs large

Bought this for my daughter to wear to a wedding. It's super cute definitely recommend a pettie coat under it to get the cute aline shape as with out it you don't get the look in the picture. We read the reviews which said it ran small so we order a size up. We actually should have order her size or even a size down as it has big on her but we were able to make it work. Super cute dress definitely would buy again.

评论概述: Runs small, material does not stretch
评论详情: Material is good quality, not flimsy or see-through, but it does not stretch at all. The dress fit well in the waist, hips, and shoulders, and the length was perfect. It was snug across the bust and too tight in the armpits. I would recommend ordering a size larger than what you normally wear.
The dress fits nicely and is made out of nice material.  I haven't worn it yet but will wear it when I desire to look nice.
I bought this dress for a graduation to attend. Although the dress fit me to a tee, the fabric doesnt stretch or breathe . Recommend for indoor festivities

Great fit. Just little to bigger than I thought.  Im 235 lbs 44DDD 3XL is too big. But im okay with loose fitting. Length is great. I love the pockets. Material is nicer quality. Wear day to day' at work or to a wedding. Very nice for any occasion dress.
Perfect fit.  Nice Quality
Beautiful dress Ready for any occasion!
Not like the picture. I went off of reviews as well and got my daughter a larger size and it fits too big.

Bought this for our Kentucky Derby themed tea party at a local tea house. Dress fit perfect and was very comfortable to wear. I received a lot of compliments. Good quality material. I purchased a petty coat to give it a little extra fullness.
I bought this dress for a wedding in attended. I got so many compliments on it. It was very flattering and so comfortable.

My wife has worn this several times since we purchased this. Everyone loved how it looked for our Christmas family picture. My wife is always sketchy about clothes online, but this dress didn't dissapoint. Definitely going to buy more products from this company.
Like the dress. Wore it to church. Beautiful print and very good length for church.

This dress is true to size and fits nicely. Not crazy about the waist tie and the dress looks nice without it!
It is such a cute drsss!  It fit well. I can not wait to wear this dress our. Nice and light. I love the cap sleeves!

Ordered this dress for a retro 50s dance. At first I was a little hesitant but I'm so glad I went ahead and pushed that order button. The dress fit me perfectly.
I was very surprised. I was expecting some cheap materials. This is a beautiful dress and good quality.
Hermoso vestido me encanta , lo pedí talla L y me quedo perfecto 👌🏻 me gusto tanto que compré casi todos 😅
Great fit and material. 5'9 and 170 lbs wearing a medium. The large was a little too loose. Study zipper. I am wearing it with a petticoat. Irons well. Color looks good. It has pockets!

2xl, I’m 5’7, 250, 42F. I would order a 3xl cause I’m too heavy but it was pretty true to size. Add a petty coat and this is very flattering. It’s not stretchy , arrived In Good packaging and the zipper was solid. I would order again.

I bought this dress to wear to my Grandmas celebration of life because she loved bees. The bees in this dress were so adorable and happy. I received so many compliments on this dress. I am 6’5 and ordered a large to be on the safe side. I probably could have gotten away with a medium. The large was a tad big but overall fit good.
I’m old and I’m a 3x. This dress makes me feel young and beautiful. The bust has a lining.a pluse
I did not care for the fabric of this dress. It wrinkled by just looking at it.
This dress fits amazingly.

This dress was ordered to attend an afternoon tea party. It turned out better than I could have expected.  The quality of the dress construction is above average and the colors really pop. I normally wear an XL but sized up and bought a 2XL after reading some reviews.  Glad I did! It fit perfectly! Even the sash is adorable. I also bought a knee length petticoat to go under the dress to give it that true retro look and fill out the skirt. Would buy again!
I love the dress fit's perfect
I bought this dress for my aunt’s 90th birthday party, wore a black crenlen underneath and black shrug sweater. I got so many compliments on my outfit, can hardly wait to wear this dress again!
I liked that the dress was lined and well made
I liked this dress ended up returning due to size being too big (my own fault). Seemed very well made! It would be so cute as a mini mouse costume
Great dress. Purchased for a fashion show and I got looks of compliments. Material quality is good. I would advise to size up. It fits a little snug in the bust area.

评论概述: I sized up 1 size for comfort
